headline: DevOps Engineer & Data Visualizer
summary: Technical Architect & Solutions Head. I help companies increase system profitability by architecturing high-availability systems using DevOps on AWS Service & on-premise H/W. I'm highly productive in monitoring systems(Nagios/ELK/Grafana) and DevOps.  Specialist:  - Monitoring systems (Nagios/Grafana/Elastic Stack)  - Big Data Analysis (ELK/Clusters)  - Nagios plugin development (bash, php, java)   - DevOps & Cloud Computing  - Designing HA & Highly Scalable Architecture  Expertise:  - Java, J2EE technologies  - DevOps - Git, Ansible, Jenkins, Docker  - NoSQL - Redis, Memcached, Mongodb, Couchdb  - RDBMS - Postgresql, MySQL, Oracle  - Postgres/MySql Replication, Load-Balancing  Proficient:  - Log Analytics - Elastic Stack  - Designing & Implementing scalable Java, JSP, PHP applications  - Solid understanding of cloud application development  - OOP software development  - Agile development practices  - Experience in CI/CD automation  - Containerizing components
organization_description_1: - Building Data Visualization Platforms (ELK). - Aggregating logs from devices - Training developers achieve their company set goals - Automating deployment (Ansible) - Deploying applications using CI/CD Jenkins pipelines.  - Load-balancing & HA (MySql, Postgres, SuiteCRM, Tomcat, JBoss, Apache) - Training developers in building stateless applications - Building Video Tutorials
organization_description_2: Working as a consultant architect on the windows platform. I provided solutions to complex issues pertaining to load-balancing and system automation.  During my time here, I implemented central logging solutions using LogStash (ELK) stacks and automation using Ansible on Windows. My final project was to cache visual chart data in Redis for faster access across the cluster.
organization_description_3: Currently maintaining the Nagios monitoring project. Spearheading the horizontal scaling of web-sites over data-centers (primarily web-servers & caching servers).. Using simple Apache/JBoss/MemCached/Redis/Tomcat/HaProxy/TwEmProxy stand-alone servers hosted across multiple servers (geographically distributed).  Achieved faster delivery of content over the Internet. My confidence lies in finding simple solutions to the complex problems. My strengths are to group related services into load-balanced clusters spanning few hundred servers across geographic regions.
organization_description_4: My favorite load-balancer of choice is Apache/NginX & HaProxy over multiple-application servers. These would in-turn use multiple-DB's across multiple-data-centers (geographic distributed) serving dozens of million's of Web-Application hits per day..  I strongly believe we should give back to the OpenSource community as they have given us much more, thus I have also published several Nagios plugins @ the Nagios-exchange with the "Send HTML Alert" email being the most popular HTML plugin for Nagios Alerts..  As a side project, I have initiated the CMS platform on which the company store's its configurations, PDF files, Videos, Forums, Tutorials, Installation manuals & Technical Knowledge.
organization_description_5: I initiated the Company wide Ubuntu migration plan and saw through the complete Windows to Ubuntu migration. I also began designing and implementing high availability Clustered Systems together with a group of talented young developers. As the depth of my exposure increased, I began working for this amazing company to initiated the Nagios Monitoring solution for the company architecture. I also provided tactical training expertise in order to boost pro-active responses when services were unavailable..
organization_description_6: As I started gaining ground on WebSite performance and its importance in revenue generation, I began concentrating on High Performance Web-Systems, especially the technological concepts and Frameworks.. I used the following technologies to establish high-performance systems: Tomcat/JBoss/Apache/MemCached & Shared Memory on Linux.. By following Yahoo's best practices in HTML & JavaScript development, Our developers were able to reduce page-load speeds by 40%.
organization_description_7: All the web-based systems were designed and developed in Java (Servlets & JSP), I initiated the Apache Velocity project in order to boost performance in hotel search.. This became a great hit as the basic Hotel description search returned in below 0.5 seconds.. The teams I worked with used Oracle 8i and Servlets to develop the hotel booking engine.   As time progressed, I began visualizing our system's to be fully Linux compatible. These were the days when Linux started making headways in Sri Lanka.. I then initiated the project to convert all our systems into Linux as it would bring down the TCO by a large margin. In the midst of many challenges, I persisted and eventually won over the complete system onto Redhat Linux after 6months of refactoring & bug fixing with a group of talented developers.  The system was initially engineered to handle about 20,000 searches during peak hours while delivering over 200 bookings daily.. As the hotel count increased, I initiated the use of memcached to boost performance by caching frequently used data.. I also initiated the serialization of the session objects in JBoss.. This enabled me to cluster/replicate the session data across multiple servers with multiple-JBoss-nodes and eventually achieving higher throughput.
organization_description_8: Worked on Java Printing Projects using Java & Native API's in order to print forms & cheques..  In the process I developed my own API to remotely connect to other machines with Printers.. I also built Java project compilers that compile hundreds of source files and emails the outcome as a report.. Developed a C++Builder Socket application that tracks file changes using the windows System Kernel API..  Technologies Used:- C++Builder , Java, HTML, JavaScript, DHTML, C++, Servlets...

headline: DevOps Engineer at GovTech Singapore
summary: I am a dedicated, well-organized and highly motivated person. I am a computer enthusiast and like to learn new technologies, try new things and bring my ideas to life. I design small software for fun and to make my day to day work easier. I like to play video games and sometimes I design small games as well.  I'm currently working as a DevOps Engineer at GovTech, Singapore. My key responsibilities are building, maintaining and upgrading the infrastructure for all of the product wide services and on-boarding customers with the product. This gives me the first-hand exposure to Amazon Web Services (EKS, IAM, Route53, etc), IaC (Terraform, Flux), Elastic Cloud, WebApp Development (React), Database design and Management (Mongo), Microservices (Express), Automation (AWX and Ansible), Bot development among other tools and technologies.
organization_description_2: Provides technical support to various Government Agencies in Singapore. Also currently involved in the development of a brand new solution which give me the first-hand exposure of the following products/technologies -  • Amazon Web Services (EKS, IAM, Route53, etc) • Elastic Cloud • Prometheus (and various exporters) • AlertManager • Grafana • AWX (upstream project of Ansible Tower) • Ansible • Docker • Kubernetes • React • Mongo • Telegram Bots • Microservices / API Development
organization_description_3: Worked as a member of the cloud-native programming language Ballerina's (https://ballerina.io) Core Team.  • Responsible for implementing Ballerina language core features and maintenance of current features.  • Mentors the Ballerina IDEA plugin development.   Worked in the Ballerina Tooling Team before moving to the Ballerina Core Team.   • Responsible for the design, development and delivery of Ballerina IDEA plugin (https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/9520-ballerina). • Worked as the Ballerina release manager. Was responsible for releasing Ballerina language.  Voluntary and Noteworthy Contributions -  • #1 contributor to Ballerina language repo (https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang).  • Added Ballerina language syntax highlighting support in Github (https://codeburst.io/how-i-added-ballerina-support-to-github-cfd2ee230a6e).  • Initiated Ballerina code quality improvement by integrating CodeClimate (https://codeclimate.com) to identify issues and reduce technical debt.  • Initiated automatic dependency update support for Ballerina by integrating Dependabot (https://dependabot.com).  • Initiated and integrated `Travis` and `AppVeyor` support to Ballerina repo to improve developer experience by saving thousands of local build hours and prevented build failures of the master branch.  • Developed Ballerina `chalk` module (https://central.ballerina.io/shan1024/chalk) which can be used to colorize the terminal output in Ballerina programs.  • Developed Ballerina `travis3` module (https://central.ballerina.io/shan1024/travis3) which can be used to connect to Travis API from Ballerina programs.  • Migrated Ballerina build to ECS which reduced the Ballerina build and release time from 3 hours to 2 hours.  • Converted the Ballerina ANTLR grammar to BNF + JFlex which is used in the Ballerina IDEA plugin.   Noteworthy skills -  • Highly skilled in ANTLR, BNF grammars and JFlex lexical analyzer generator.
organization_description_4: I was allocated the Platform Team as soon as I joined WSO2. I was involved in developing the following products/tools.  • Carbon Kernel (Java) - https://github.com/wso2/carbon-kernel    Developed a configuration management system for deployments.  • UUF - Unified UI Framework (Java, JS) - https://github.com/wso2-attic/carbon-uuf    Various improvements and bug fixes.  • WUM - WSO2 Update Manager (GO, msf4j)    Involved in both client side and server side development. The client was written in GO language and the server side was written in msf4j as microservices. Used JPA to persist data and Mockito for writing tests.  • UCT - Update Creator Tool (GO)    Update creation tool which is used to create updates for WUM. Was responsible for design, development and delivery.   Later I was moved to Ballerina Tooling Team. I contributed to the development of the following products/tools while I was in the Ballerina Tooling Team.  • Ballerina IDEA Plugin   Was responsible for the development, delivery and maintenance of Ballerina IDEA plugin.  • Ballerina Core -    Adding `string template` support to Ballerina language.   Noteworthy Contributions -  • Wrote the first ever Ballerina standard library (cache library) which was written in Ballerina itself.  • Mentored the Siddhi IDEA plugin (https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/10212-siddhi) development.
organization_description_6: During my internship period, I was involved in following activities.  • New modules creation (Order Status, Cash Transfer, Marginable Symbols Window, Mini Trade, Rapid Order Entry, Contact Us) • GUI designing and improving. • Debugging. • Code quality checking (using SonarQube) and improving. • Updating documentation (Wiki page) • Creating new build scripts using Ant. • Research about Gradle. • Creating new build scripts using Gradle. • Creating Install Shields. • Building and deploying the UAT versions.

Current work mainly focus on Azure Dev ops based Build & Release pipelines using self hosted agents. I use azure dev ops pipelines to deploy application to Dev/QA & Pre-Prod environments.  Latest work involve Deploying a spring boot based microservices application to Google Kubernetes Engine using Terraform Kubernetes Provider.
organization_description_5: Worked as an application support engineer for the Salestar Connect Team. Salestar Connected is a mobile phone Distribution & Reselling application developed for the UK & Ireland Market.   The Salestar Connect Application extensively covers Sales, Inventory, Marketing, Self Billing, Lead Management, Channel Management (Retail,B2B,Corporate,Distribution), Handling both Corporate & Retail Customers, Revenue Assurance, Reporting regarding Sales & Profits, Individual level management of KPI   All Support tickets were directed at me and First line team liaise with the clients and pass the clients concerns to us. Since all of the tickets are directed at myself I have extensive knowledge on how the each channel works from the back-end, the business processes that are driving each channel and it’s revenue generation plan. IN depth knowledge in Business logic that drives each channel.  Training new Second line Support Members. I was the first support line engineer recruited by Programus. During my tenure i gross valuable experience in support issues investigation & resolution. These were passed very timely manner to development team & new Support team members.  Management of the daily data backup and retrieval scheme And Routine Maintenance of Jobs. Applying patches, Version releases, in accordance with company procedure.

Designing of the System & configuration of web services.  Involvement in maintenance & expansion of suite of applications that process customer orders. The application originally developed in Java/Oracle process client installations, Service Feature Requests, Service address Changes & Client disconnections/activations.  The application mainly developed through GWT, Spring , Oracle, Itext automates the generation of Lanka Bell (pvt) ltd phone and Wi,max bill to staff members. System generates the bill and email’s the bill to staff members.
organization_description_7: Air Arabia Holidays is the E-commerce Web application that attracts Revenue to Air Arabia Airways. As a associate solution Developer I was directly involved with developing the Front end of the Air Arabia Holidays Web application. This Java based application which uses spring, Hibernate, HTML5 & CSS. Application was completed by the Air Arabia Holidays Team and is now used by people all over the world to book flights to Middle East Tourist Destinations. The application can completely handle a Tour for a customer from boarding the flight to incoming flights. It also enables to book Hotels & trips to Favorite Tourist attractions via Coach.

It was my responsibility to design an optimal solution from gathering requirement, choosing the right cloud computing model, designing the network architecture, preparing the bill-of-materials, to deploying, configuring, and troubleshooting the workloads.  Primary solutions included: - Deploying and configuring multi-vendor Network Virtual Appliances, Web Application Firewalls to secure cloud workloads. - Provisioning Application Gateways, Azure Front Door, Load Balancers for high availability and global accessibility. - Configuring private connectivity for isolated environments by VPNs, Private Links and Private Endpoints. - Deploying Virtual Desktop Infrastructure, to address multi session desktops or applications. - Designing AI-based solutions with vision, search, speech, language, decision APIs using Azure Cognitive Services. - Building repeatable deployment methods using Infrastructure as Code, e.g., Terraform - Designing infrastructure for application modernization and securing application actions with Key Vaults. - Implementing backup and disaster recovery options in Microsoft Azure and performing DR drills based on customer requirement. - Maintaining IT governance, through policies and cost optimizations.  Other solutions: - Hardening servers based on vulnerability assessments and Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit 1.0. - Providing automated solutions with PowerShell scripting. - Active Directory consolidation and Active Directory upgrade. - Presenting proof-of-concepts of Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365 products to customers. - Migrating on-premises and cloud mailboxes to Office 365. - Performing health checks for customers with Service Level Agreements. - Handling L2 and L3 service requests related to Microsoft Azure, Office 365, Windows Server 2008, 2012/R2, 2016, 2019 and Linux.

education_description_2: Received Silver Award for the research paper at SLIIT research symposium in 2016. -The concept of the research is to develop a prediction model to forecast water quality relative to pH, dissolved oxygen, turbidity and conductivity (Artificial Neural Network and ARIMA model)   	The improvements in computational power tended prediction based research to focus on Artificial Neural Network (ANN). Even though conventional algorithms handled similar tasks, a higher tenancy on applying ANN can be seen.   	We test the improvement on prediction over a conventional algorithm. We use ANN and ARIMA on small time series datasets.  	 Results generated through both the algorithms are compared with each other to see the improvement. The result that which were generated reveals that for a small dataset the conventional algorithms hold a higher accuracy rate than the ANN.  	Research was completed successfully with A- grade.

headline: DevOps Engineer
summary: Devops Engineer by profession, Electrical and Electronic engineer by education, and tech enthusiast  by passion.  “You have no idea what you are capable of, until you try” by this motto I live. My keen on learning, exploring, and experiencing new things led me to discover new areas of interest and skills that empowered me to define and redirect my career path, until I became a DevOps Engineer Specialist.  By working with one of the leading technology-powered companies, I gained lot of expertise in the latest Technologies in the Devops field. I get hands-on experience in cloud computing(Amazon Web Services), Monitoring(Prometheus), bash scripting, CI/CD (Jenkins), container orchestration management (Kubernetes), Configuration management (Saltstack),  Centralized logs management (ELK stack),  Identity Access Management (FreeIPA/LDAP), infrastructures as Code (terraform), In additional  to a lot of soft skills gained by collaborating with developers, architects, and QA.
organization_description_1: Tajawal/Almosafer/Seera Group   Tajawal and Almosafer are online travel agencies under Seera goup which is a leading technology-powered travel and tourism company in the middle east. Being DevOps Engineer there, I was responsible of the followings: - Creating terraform modules then using them to provision infrastructure on AWS. - Writing Saltstack formulas to configure servers. ex: Mongodb, Redis, Elasticsearch, Kafka ... etc. - Containers(Docker) and container orchestration management using Kubernetes - Groovy pipelines with Jenkins for CI/CD - Identity Access Management using FreeIPA/LDAP - Centralized logs management using elk stack - Monitoring with Prometheus
organization_description_2: DevOps Engineer Trainee
organization_description_3: Jadarah is an intensive 6-month talent accelerator programme founded by the Middle East’s leading technology-powered travel and tourism company; Seera, in partnership with Google, Twitter, Amadeus and Udacity.  During Jadarah I was exposed to : - Trainings & workshops by business experts in various topics - Networking opportunities with industry leaders  - One-on-one mentorship - Intensive on-the-job training mainly in DevOps - Working in group for personal startup project
organization_description_4: Junkbot is robotic company that teaches people to create and build working robots from almost anything. They provide a kit that contains various sensors and controllers (Arduino and Raspberry Pi) that can be added to transfer any house hold objects such as plastic bottles and old CDs, wooden spoons or cardboard into unique, imaginative robots that can be programmed for a variety of functions.  Being trainee at Junkbot I was organizing and leading Robotics, mobile app, Artificial intelligence, 3D printing and coding workshops among various schools and organizations. Along with Creating content to their website and documents. Examples of projects I worked in: - Ana-vation competition, which is a competition using Junkbot kit to create robots that help cancer patients (sponsored by FOCP ). - Future Engineer Camps, which is  a two weeks intensive programs that teach students to build their own robots and mobile apps (Sponsored by DEWA) - Multiple one day workshops for various companies and schools, such as: DEWA employees, PWC employees, Ministry of economy in Abu Dhabi, AL-Jalila Culture Center and much more. - Designed, build, and programed lot of Innovative Robots for display purpose.

summary: I am currently following the BEng Software Engineering degree offered by the University of Westminster(UK) at the Informatics Institute of Technology, specializing in DevOps and Server-side development. I exhibit an entrepreneurial mentality, eager to learn independently, adapt to different environments and committed to utilizing my skills to further the mission of a company.  I come from a solid technical background with a strong interest in business and a passion towards strategy. My area of focus and interest varies from quantitative DevOps technologies. I have maintained good grades through a well-balanced program of study, which is not only very analytical and technical by nature but also helps to build leadership and team-building qualities. I am extremely impressed with Great Strategy’s approach to DevOps culture, notably within the Business Development and Innovation practice areas.  Prior to IIT, I worked as a mentor, primarily helping the student to get more enhanced knowledge in software development and related academic areas. I gained solid leadership, analytical and problem-solving skills while founding the start-up company called Instic Sri Lanka. My background in generating innovative ideas and strategies to improve processes has provided me with a deeper understanding of multifaceted problems that companies encounter in their daily operations. Moreover, because of my entrepreneurship experiences, I fully understand how important it is to have great team dynamics in today’s multi-disciplinary business environment.  To date, my experience as an IT student has been extremely rewarding and productive. However, it is through strategy consulting that I can use my analytical aptitude and creative problem-solving skills to their fullest. I strongly believe that consulting is a discipline that will force me to view problems not only from the client’s standpoint but also from a marketplace, best practices and “think out of the box” point of views. organization_description_4: Senit Technologies is a fully owned subsidiary of Sunshine Travels and Tours (SST) which is an IATA, SLAITO and TAASL member, registered under the Sri Lanka Tourist Board. SST is jointly owned by Sunshine Holdings and Blue Ocean Ventures, which is a BOI approved venture capital fund.  Since 2000 the Senit team has provided the reservation technology to global online travel agents who handle online reservations of thousands of hotels, villas, guest houses, apartments and BBs from around the world. During Senit’s years in operation, the company has developed XML links with over 100 plus global wholesalers as well as online hotel reservation systems of individual hotels. Recently, Senit brought this global technology to the Sri Lankan market with the aim of assisting the local tourism industry, to develop according to the requirements of the international tourism market and thereby increase their revenue.  Our strength lies in the fact that we are constantly evolving and growing. As a company, we are always ahead of the game regarding online trends and requirements. We develop intelligent online reservation systems which are innovative so that our customers reap the benefits of a relevant and functional online presence. Considering the current infrastructure and tourism boom in Sri Lanka and understanding the increase in online usage for day to day activities including holiday requirements, an online reservation facility is now a necessity for any accommodation supplier.

WHO WE ARE  Our mission has always focused on helping our customers succeed, wherever they are in their education and professional careers.  We are bridging the higher education gap by delivering content solutions in new and innovative ways to enrich the learning experience. We are a proven leader in strategic higher education consulting and partnering with educators and institutions globally to achieve success, and our print and digital solutions enable students and instructors worldwide. We encourage learning to be a continuous, lifelong experience – an integral, essential part of every stage of building a career.  We are closing the talent deficit by supporting employers, helping them find and retain top talent, assess their employees’ skill sets, and implement training in order to transform company cultures. For decades we’ve helped people learn; today we’re showing them new ways to achieve, get certified and advance their careers.  We are strengthening the research community by partnering with learned societies and supporting researchers to communicate discoveries that make a difference. We collaborate with authors, societies, libraries, and other members of the research community to generate, communicate, and enable access to the scientific and scholarly insights that are helping to solve some of the world’s biggest challenges. headline: Senior Software Engineer | Java | Spring Boot | Angular | Full Stack | DevOps | AWS
summary: Profile Background :   Full Stack Software Developer with more than five years of Software Engineering experience in developing all layers of enterprise applications from database design to backend services to front-ends. Has deep hands on experience in requirement analysing, designing, implementing, testing and managing complex software systems with stringent up time. I focus toward enterprise level software solutions, high performance and fostering technical innovation to create software applications and products to offer world class technology experience. Furthermore I try to utilize my collective skill set in a senior developer role leading a team towards its goals.  Key Technologies and Methodologies :   Develop web applications using technologies like Java, Spring Boot, Angular with database technologies like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis. Use popular frameworks and libraries like Hibernate, Spring Data Rest, Spring Data JPA, QueryDSL, Spring Security, Oauth2, JBoss/Keycloak. Design and deploy web applications into production with Amazon Web Services. Follow industry best practice while developing software and maintaining products.
organization_description_1: - Lead Design/Development/Architecture of the company Workflow Management System and MetalSignals application. - Use new technologies to develop new applications and always update legacy applications to avoid maintenance disasters. - Make necessary disaster recovery plans with the related parties to avoid unnecessary breakdown in products. - Design and execute initial database schemas with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB using database migration tools like flyway. - Integrate Oauth2 security measurements with the use of Spring Security and JBoss/Keycloak to establish a centralized identity management service to the company. - Design and develop the initial stage of a web application with technologies like Java(1.8), Spring Boot(2.0 +), Angular(7+). - Use of multiple Spring starter projects to ease the development difficulty.(Spring Data, Spring Rest, Spring Security Starter, Spring Starter Test). - Oversee the operation of deploying applications to Amazon Web Services and engage and provide solutions to production issues. - Provide necessary support and criteria for the Testing team to conduct and proper Test for each and every product. - Identify and fix production issues immediately and guide  developers to recognize production issues easily. - Design and implementation of high availability/security and stability improvements to all applications. - Identifying technology limitations and deficiencies in existing systems and associated processes, procedures and methods to overcome project development related issues. - Recommending optimum coding methodologies based on latest coding developments and project needs.  - Depth hands on experience in requirement analysing, designing, implementing, testing and managing complex software systems with stringent up time requirements.

Use excel, csv and satellite images as raw input and produce and one final report to make the necessary analysis. - Develop web applications with Java(1.8), Spring Boot(1.5+), Angular(5+), Spring Security, Oauth2. - Use of database technologies, MySQL, Redis, Mango with Spring Data JPA, Spring Data Rest. - Deployment of  web applications into production environments. - Testing, debugging, diagnosing and correcting errors and faults in an application programming language within established testing protocols, guidelines and quality standards to ensure programs and applications perform to specification. - Participating in requirements gathering with business related entities. - Providing technical solutions through research activities.

headline: Senior QA & DevOps Consultant
summary: I work in consultant capacity for QA/DevOps for existing and proposed/experimental software solutions usually requiring thorough analyzation of specific design architectures/solutions, identifying probable bottle necks and fault points affecting expected business needs, and designing and managing tests accordingly. (I mostly work on distributed and IOT based data gathering where fault detection/correction is of highest important. Identifying and implementing redundant methodologies for specific pathways and use cases to enable highest possible reliability). I usually help troubleshooting systems where demand for high availability/reliability is of priority, and do manage/design external DevOps with delivery teams, targeting seamless delivery and implementation. I'm highly passionate when it comes to exploring and experimenting new technics and philosophies. Job satisfaction is very important to me more than anything else. I believe good team dynamics is the key to success when undertaking any endeavor.
organization_description_1: High volume transaction TII standardized automated highway tolling system. Multiple redundancies have been incorporated within the system with state of the art highway gantry system capturing VRN(Vehicle Registration Numbers) and resolving data using a state of the art machine learning algorithms and generating automated invoices for both video tolling and tag (RFID) tolling vehicles. (M50 Highway Ireland)  System involves multiple user interfaces (including Android & iOS app) & user levels(Policy Based and fully compliant with current GDPR) for different roles including customers, support services, financial management, service management & law enforcement. Many around the clock automated background processes seamlessly deals with user payments via both Pre-pay & Post-Pay options depending on customer choices & deals with enforcement penalty queries while keeping the system on a very low level of manual monitoring & intervention which is a state of the art achievement  compared to many other similar systems currently on use. The entire system works effortlessly with regard to the high amount of data transfer between primary system components which by design includes automatic diagnose and fault detection & correction methods. This fault tolerant design is crucial for such a distributed and interdependent system which in itself is very sophisticated in detail yet simplistic enough from a abstract high level architectural design view point which ultimately works quite reliably to meet the high demand of a busy high way tolling system.
organization_description_2: Test design & execution for a modern Blockchain Based System for Business Components requiring high level of data integrity. Testing of EdCast based modern learning platform integrated with multiple backend services & Single Sign On (SSO) System. Monitor all business and functional requirements for all tests and documents all test cases and assist to resolve all issues. Maintain Test Artifacts(Requirement Documents/Test Plan/Requirement Matrices/Defect Summary) Execute test plans and report results and recommended fixing. Perform functional/ non-functional/Regression/System/Integration Testing both manual and automation. Reporting of Test Results & JIRA issue reviews on daily basis to manage time more efficiently for projects requiring tight schedules.
organization_description_3: Implement all test cases and evaluate all results and prepare test data and design all functional tests in required framework and monitor all development cycles and implement scripts on same. Analyze and identify presence of any bug in system and escalate issues if required and assist all engineers to validate and resolve all bug issues. Always try out different processes, tools and technologies for better automation to save time Learn and do some R&D with AWS tools and services to get a better understanding about them in order to see the quality aspect of the systems under develop.
organization_description_4: On day to day basis I Establish and evolve formal QA processes, ensuring that the team is using industry-accepted best practices. Also oversee all aspects of quality assurance including establishing metrics, applying industry best practices, and developing new tools and processes to ensure quality goals are met. I also act as key point of contact for all QA aspects of releases, providing QA services and coordinating QA resources internally and externally. Being QA Lead I mentor QA team members, as well as manage outside contract testers. My Main tasks are development and execution of test cases, scripts, devising test plans and procedures (manual and automated).
organization_description_6: The community is made up of software testers from all over the world, at different stages of their careers, with different skill sets and life goals, and all are welcome and valued here. We pride ourselves on really connecting with our community, no matter how big it gets! Our community members mean everything to us, they guide us on how to better support testers and co-create all the awesome things we make and do. “Having knowledge of a set of tools is less important than knowing when and where to use the right tool.”

Specialties - Kubernetes/Docker, Linux/Unix/BSD, AWS/Azure/GCP, Prometheus/Jaeger, Terraform, Ansible, Python/GO, CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/CircleCI/TravisCI) , SELinux , Vagrant/Packer, KVM/XEN , Networking/Security/Firewalls  * Information Security Specialist - My Masters postgraduate thesis was a research on SELinux Multi Level Security. That is, I built a generic SELinux policy precedence set to be followed by SELinux Security Administrator to securely execute multiple network services in a single SELinux system based on the lattice information flow approach composed with a custom Bell Lapadula Security Model. The Masters were completed at the University of Moratuwa, Department of Computer Science & Engineering, Sri Lanka.    * Currently working at Transferwise based in Tallinn, Estonia , moved to the Europe :)
